title: Chilli-lime chicken kebabs
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 1/2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 lime, juiced', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon onion granules', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', 'cayenne pepper, to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '450g skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 4cm pieces', 'skewers']
